attributes.action: For teens 13+ to be able to drive with 3 different licences obtained by 3 lesson
attributes.additional_details: It reliefs strain and pressure on families and parents and it helps teens become more active and enjoy going out places and with friends and doing all things that teens love to do and it can encourage teens to be more independent and it can help teens socialise more with friends and family who live quite far away.
attributes.background: To allow teens 13 and older are able to drive with 3 different licences obtained by 3 different driving lessons to prove they are good enough to drive because if there are more than one teen in a household its hard for a parent to keep driving around and meeting each teens needs to be somewhere.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to when people are able to start driving, but we're not sure what you mean when you want "3 different licences obtained by 3 different driving lessons". It's not clear how you want these licences or lessons to differ, or what rules would apply to these licences and lessons.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
